meta.description: Bill Gates recently stated on Reddit that "digital certificates" will be used to identify who received the upcoming COVID-19 vaccine. And these certificates will also be used to identify who can conduct business or not. Here's how this plan is already backed by a massive organization called ID2020.

title: Bill Gates Calls for a "Digital Certificate" to Identify Who Received COVID-19 Vaccine
cleaned_text: Bill Gates recently stated on Reddit that “digital certificates” will be used to identify who received the upcoming COVID-19 vaccine. And these certificates will also be used to identify who can conduct business or not. Here’s how this plan is already backed by a massive organization called ID2020.
